Package org.example.GUI.ui

Class ImageDealingWith

java.lang.Object
org.example.GUI.ui.ImageDealingWith
public class ImageDealingWith extends Object
A utility class for dealing with images used in the GUI.

    • GetSpriteAtlas

      public static BufferedImage GetSpriteAtlas(String fileName)
      Loads a sprite atlas image from the specified file name.
      Parameters:
      fileName - The name of the image file to load.
      Returns:
      The loaded BufferedImage, or null if the loading fails.
